survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the effectiveness and experience of remote onboarding processes in organizations.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall experience with the remote onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear differentiation. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.
